wikipedia_page.main: William Joseph Barr (born 21 January 1969) is an English former footballer and manager. He took up the post of caretaker manager at Wrexham after the departure of Andy Morrell as manager, but failed to secure the position permanently. He is currently assistant manager to Gary Bowyer at Salford City.

response: *Billy Barr (naturalist), famous for collecting 40 years of climate change data

In April 2012, Morrell signed a new two-year deal with Wrexham, one year as a player then an additional year as manager, working alongside Assistant/Goalkeeper coach Michael Oakes and Assistant Billy Barr.
